mapper.select: select w.no, w.title, m.NAME, w.recommend, w.accept from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO = m.NO order by w.no desc

select w.no, w.title, m.NAME, w.recommend, w.accept, to_char(w.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO = m.NO and title like '%' || #{wKwd} || '%' order by w.no desc

select * from(select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select w.no, w.title, m.NAME, w.recommend, w.accept, to_char(w.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO = m.NO order by w.no desc) c) where (#{pageNo} - 1) * 10 + 1 <= rnum and rnum <= #{pageNo} * 10

select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select w.no, w.title, m.NAME, w.recommend, w.accept, to_char(w.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO = m.NO and title like '%' || #{wKwd} || '%' order by w.no desc) c) where (#{pageNo} - 1) * 10 + 1 <= rnum and rnum <= #{pageNo} * 10
select w.title, w.publisher, w.reason, to_char(w.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, w.recommend, w.accept, m.name from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO = m.NO and w.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into book values( seq_book.nextval, #{title}, 0, ' ', (select no from publisher where title = (select publisher from wishbook where no = #{no})), 0)
insert into wishbook values( seq_wishbook.nextval, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{reason}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{memberNo})
mapper.update: update wishbook set accept=1 where no=#{no}
update wishbook set accept=2 where no=#{no}
update wishbook set recommend=recommend+1 where no=#{no}
